comment: Really enjoyed this class online! Powerpoints and videos covered all the topics, and were helpful when completing the assignments! Very organized for an online class! Would take her again!

Excellent! Had her online for biostat, always responds to emails, extremely representative slides. Do all your work and you should be fine. Study the homeworks and quizzes. Ended up getting an A. Would take her again if she was teaching other Bio courses.

Online class was horrible idea with Grabich. Her website was very poorly organized and extremely confusing. There was NO lecture at all in the class. Not even videos of her working a problem or example. She was zero use in the class.
Goes out of her way to be helpful even with difficult material.  I did ok in the class.  I would take another class from her in the future.
